item.description:
Some of you may ask, Why? Well, because on this day in 1933, the Cullen-Harrison Act was passed, thus legalizing the production and sale of beer and wine with an alcohol content of 3.2%. Kool-Aid by today's standards but headed in the right direction none-the-less.

Let's have a drink or two (you have the right to choose one with alcohol or without) to toast the freedom to imbibe beer and wine legally....that is if you're at least 21.

Get there when you can. I'll arrive at 4:30 PM and hang until 5:45 PM

The first new member who finds me, gets a free drink.

Don't be shy...Say hi

Check out MBTA or HopStop to create your route by public transit.

 

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: You'll find me at the bar with a Guinness
item.name: Let's Raise a Pint to the Cullen-Harrison Act
